scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.clean:
IF EXIST frontend
ode_modules rd /s /q frontend
ode_modules && IF EXIST backend
ode_modules rd /s /q backend
ode_modules && IF EXIST frontend\package-lock.json del frontend\package-lock.json && IF EXIST backend\package-lock.json del backend\package-lock.json
